title: The importance of Jonathan Davies: Why 'Fox' is the back-line inspiration Warren Gatland cannot do without
text:
Rassie Erasmus did not try to hide his thoughts. “Ya, you’re spot on,” the South Africa head coach agreed on Thursday when asked whether Wales losing Jonathan Davies to injury would compare with South Africa losing Cheslin Kolbe, their star winger. “I think if Wales lose him they definitely lose a guy who is intimidating, who has got soft skills, who has experience, who knows how to exploit big, tired forwards. They will lose someone with a similar influence to Cheslin.”

Arguably, even more. It is difficult to overstate just how important Davies is to this Wales team; just what a totemic figure the softly-spoken centre has become. Which is why it was such a boost for Wales that they were able...
description: Rassie Erasmus did not try to hide his thoughts.
